Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Caerin 3.1 (XXA, natural AMPs; UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: It might have an alpha helix conformation.Activity: Activity against B.cereus (MIC >100 ug/ml), E.coli (MIC>100 ug/ml), L.lactis (MIC >100 uM), L.innocua (MIC >100 ug/ml), M.luteus (MIC <0.4 ug/ml, S.aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC >100 ug/ml), S.epidermidis (MIC >100 ug/ml), S.uberis (MIC >100 ug/ml), E.clocae (MIC >100 ug/ml), P.multocida (MIC>100 ug/ml), and P.haemolytica (MIC >100 ug/ml).Updated 5/2020, 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Stone,D.J.M., Waugh,R.J., Bowie,J.H., Wallace,J.C. and Tyler,M.J.1992, Australia
Literature Information.Title: Peptides from Australian frogs. Structures of the caerins and caeridin 1 from Litoria splendida
